metadata.Title: CVE-2021-40426 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the sphere.cstart_read() functionality of Sound Exchange libsox 14.4.2 and mastercommit 42b3557e. A specially-crafted file can lead to a heap bufferoverflow. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: sox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
